# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY  Bad_PWL_Source.cir Bad_PWL_Source.cir.sh badTimeVoltageList.csv tags options DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Bad_PWL_Source.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_657_SON/Bad_PWL_Source.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} Bad_PWL_Source.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} Bad_PWL_Source.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_657_SON/Bad_PWL_Source.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_657_SON/Bad_PWL_Source.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;vpwl;pwl;errorexit;bug785")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_657_SON/Bad_PWL_Source.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} Bad_PWL_Source.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} Bad_PWL_Source.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_657_SON/Bad_PWL_Source.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_657_SON/Bad_PWL_Source.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;vpwl;pwl;errorexit;bug785")
endif()
